after: After completing my master's degree in molecular biology at Tokyo Medical and Dental University, I decided to follow my passion for coding and relocated to Germany. I enrolled at CODE University of Applied Sciences in Berlin, where I actively participated in three projects and secured two working student positions. After graduation, I joined Luup Systems GmbH as a full-time software developer, gaining hands-on experience in building scalable web applications.
current: After my time at Luup, I moved back to Japan and joined airCloset Inc. as a Full-Stack Developer, where I currently lead and contribute to new projects.
passion: I'm particularly drawn to the problem-solving aspect of programming
passion2: , finding immense satisfaction in overcoming challenges. My primary tech stack comprises
techStack: FastAPI, Flask, Node.js, NestJs, Next.js, React and PostgreSQL
additionalProficiency: with additional proficiency in TypeScript and Python. Eager to stay abreast of emerging technologies, I'm always on the lookout for opportunities to expand my skill set.
bouldering: , I indulge in bouldering and climbing to stay active and challenge myself physically.
